item.description:
Zesta 101: The Art and Science of Presenting Yourself

Speakers: Jennifer Roberge and Anita Eliason

Cost: Members- $15 in advance (pay $20 online and receive a $5 refund on checkin), $20 at the door. Non-members- $20.

According to a Yale psychology professor, 90 percent of a first impression is based on appearance, posture, facial expression, and tone of voice – and very little that you actually say. Your style can propel you to the top of your field or leave you in the dust. Learn how to unlock your personal style and look your best with tips from Zesta Style’s co-founders, Jennifer Roberge and Anita Eliason.

 

What is Zesta Style?

Zesta Style is a full-service fashion company that is dedicated to helping women achieve inner beauty through self-confidence and outer beauty through personal style. Zesta blends Anita’s expertise in clothing design and custom tailoring and Jennifer’s experience as a style consultant, closet reorganizer, and creative director for high-end fashion retailers like Bergdorf Goodman and Eileen Fisher. Together, they take colors, styles, and designs to empower women to express themselves through fashion and accessories.
item.name: September Breakfast Meeting: Zesta 101: The Art & Science of Presenting Yourself
